biotools.summary: FreeSASA is an open source library and command line tool to calculate the solvent accessible surface areas of protein molecules. The library is as fast and accurate as existing tools, with the advantage of being open source and available as both a library, a command line tool and it has Python bindings.

bioschemas.name: FreeSASA
